### Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(tigris)
```


### Read in data
```{r}
homicides <- read_csv("data/homicide-data.csv")
```

### View data
```{r}
head(homicides)
unique(homicides$city)
```
